title: 1.2 Master Challenge 3
question:
Create a list of the most expensive cars in the world in 2022.

The current list is from the year 2021. Write a program to create the list using int, double and String type of variables. You need to change the values and shuffle the list according to the rankings in 2022.

List of most expensive cars in the world in 2021.

List of most expensive cars in the world in 2022.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
